SEARCH
Package fr.foxelia.parity.protocol

Class Toaster

java.lang.Object
fr.foxelia.parity.protocol.Toaster
public class Toaster extends Object
Use the Toaster to make some Toast. That is a class to create Toast Notifications
It uses NMS to create the Toast, so look and adapt the imports to your server version
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zarinoow

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field

    static final net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType
    CHALLENGE

    static final net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType
    GOAL

    static final net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType

  • Field Details

    • TASK

      public static final net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType TASK
      A Task Toast is a yellow titled "Advancement made!"

    • CHALLENGE

      public static final net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType CHALLENGE
      A Goal Toast is a pink titled "Challenge Complete!" and plays a sound

    • GOAL

      public static final net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType GOAL
      A Challenge Toast is a green titled "Goal Reached!"

  • Constructor Details

    • Toaster

      public Toaster(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon, String text, net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType frame)
      Creates a Toast Notification with visible information
      Parameters:
      icon - The Item to display in the Toast
      text - The Text to display in the Toast (Use a maximum of 64 characters including spaces)
      frame - The Frame Type of the Toast
      Use TASK for a Task Toast
      Use CHALLENGE for a Goal Toast
      Use GOAL for a Challenge Toast

    • Toaster

      public Toaster(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon, String title, String description, String backgroundTexture, net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementFrameType frameType)
      Creates a Toast Notification with useless information It's recommended to use Toaster(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, String, AdvancementFrameType) instead I don't know why you would use this constructor
      Parameters:
      icon - The Item to display in the Toast
      title - The Text to display in the Toast
      description - The description of the Advancement (not displayed)
      backgroundTexture - The path to texture of the Advancement (not displayed)
      frameType - The Frame Type of the Toast
      Use TASK for a Task Toast
      Use CHALLENGE for a Goal Toast
      Use GOAL for a Challenge Toast
      See Also:
      • Toaster(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, String, AdvancementFrameType)

  • Method Details

    • sendTo

      public void sendTo(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Sends the Toast to the target Player
      Parameters:
      player - The Player to send the Toast to

    • constructPacket

      public net.minecraft.network.protocol.game.PacketPlayOutAdvancements constructPacket(boolean add)
      Constructs the Advancement Packet ready to be sent
      Parameters:
      add - Whether to add or remove the Advancement
      True to add the Advancement
      False to remove the Advancement
      Returns:
      PacketPlayOutAdvancements A AdvancementPacket to be sent to the Player
